errors.objIdInvalidChars: This field may contain only alphanumeric characters and _, ., ~, -
errors.objIdNoWhitespace: This field must not contain any whitespace

errors.editPerm: A role with the edit permission must also include the "view" permission.

errors.emptyMigrationObj: Objects to be migrated must be specified
errors.emptyMigrationSchema: No objects found for migration as the chosen schemas are empty.
errors.emptyVisualizeSchema: No objects found for visualization as the chosen schemas are empty.
errors.enforceNoLimit: Failed to remove limit from the statement
errors.entryPrivReq: At least one privilege must be selected.
errors.entryPrivReqWithGrant: At least one privilege must be selected or grant option enabled.
errors.etlCanceledFailed: Failed to cancel ETL operation. Please check the logs for more information.
errors.etl_create_stage: No data has been migrated as certain objects could not be created. Examine the output messages, make any necessary changes to the script, then restart it.
errors.failedToExeStatements: Failed to execute SQL statement. | Failed to execute SQL statements.
errors.fkColsRequirements: The foreign key columns and the referenced columns must be of the same type, or similar types. For integer types, the size and sign must also be the same.
errors.injectLimit: An unexpected error occurred while injecting LIMIT
errors.maxStatements: Maximum number of statements ({0}) has been reached. Adjust the query settings as necessary.
errors.migration: Migration has several problems. For further details, please see the output messages.
errors.noDriversFound: No ODBC drivers were found on your system, please check your drivers configuration.
errors.persistentStorage: Persistent storage maximum size reached, please navigate to History/Snippets tab and delete some to create more space.
errors.requiredActiveSchema: No active schema. To set a default schema, double-click on its name in the schema tree explorer.
errors.requiredCatalog: Catalog must be defined for generic ODBC.
errors.requiredConn: No connection found, please create a new one. The editor relies on a connection to retrieve essential metadata, such as engines, character sets, and collations.
errors.requiredDb: Database must be defined for the chosen driver.
errors.requiredFields: Please fill out all required fields.
errors.retrieveSchemaObj: Failed to retrieve schema objects from source.
errors.rowLimitExceeded: Maximum row limit ({0}) exceeded. Contact your administrator to adjust this setting.
errors.splitStatements: Failed to split statements. Please make sure each statement is separated by a semicolon (';').
errors.tlsSpecifiedOptRequired: Either issuer, subject, or cipher must be defined

workspaceView.etlConfirmMigration: I understand that the same objects will be overwritten.

info.clearSelectedQueries: You're about to delete the {quantity} {targetType}. This action is irreversible. The {quantity} {targetType} will be erased from all logs.
info.columnsLimit: The number of rendered columns is automatically limited to 50 for smoother scrolling and memory management. Use the columns dropdown on the right to toggle visibility. Increasing it can cause the GUI to run out of memory.
info.defLimit: Specify the number of rows to return. Increase cautiously; a very large limit can cause the GUI to run out of memory
info.deleteEtlTask: This would also delete the worksheet used to launch this migration task.
info.disconnectAll: There are open database connections from Workspace. Uncheck the box to keep these connections open.
info.erdTableSupport: ERD is generated based on the definitions of foreign keys. Therefore, only tables using InnoDB storage engines will be displayed since others lack support for foreign keys.
info.etlConfirm: If the destination server already has the same objects they will be overwritten and existing data will be lost.
info.etlDocLinkText: Read more on our documentation for instruction.
info.etlOverviewInfo: MaxScale uses ODBC for extracting and loading from the data source to a server in MaxScale. Make sure you preconfigure the necessary drivers for your data source.
info.exeStatementsInfo: This action is irreversible, so please review the above statement. | This action is irreversible, so please review the above statements.
info.fkEngineSupport: Foreign Keys can only be defined for InnoDB tables.
info.identifierAutoCompletion: All identifiers from the active schema will be retrieved automatically upon the initial launch
info.incompleteResultSet: Query executed with a {0} rows limit. Consider raising it cautiously; a very large limit can cause the GUI to run out of memory.
info.killProcessesThatHasSessions: The following process ids are MaxScale's sessions and will be killed separately: {0}
info.logAutoGenSql: Records background queries that retrieve metadata or support interface functions.
info.logUserSql: Records queries manually written and run in the Query Editor.
info.maxStatements: Maximum number of statements to be executed. Increasing it can cause the GUI to run out of memory.
info.migrationScriptInfo: Scripts generated for each table will be executed in parallel. Before migrating, you can make changes to the script.
info.showTrendline: The trend line can only be computed for linear axis

sqlExportOpt.structure: Generate a basic table creation script with only column data types and sizes.

info.tabBehavior: Pressing <kbd>TAB</kbd> in the editor can either move focus to the next focusable element or insert the tab character. Check the box to move focus or uncheck it to insert a tab character. Alternatively, while focusing on the editor, press {0} to change this behavior.
info.timeoutVariables: Timeout variables are applied only to workspace connections.

workspaceView.processListNoConn: Database connection required. Please connect to view the process list.

workspaceView.showConfirmBeforeLeave: Show confirmation before leaving the page
workspaceView.showQueryConfirm: Show confirmation before executing the statements
workspaceView.snippetTabGuide: Query snippets are empty. Press {shortcut} or click {icon} to create a query snippet.
workspaceView.userManagementGuide: Click a row to alter a user, or {icon} to create a new one

warnings.ignoredMigrationSchemas: You have chosen some empty schemas, they will not be migrated.
warnings.ignoredVisualizeSchemas: You have chosen some empty schemas, they will not be visualized.
warnings.noLimit: Running a query with no limit can cause the GUI to run out of memory. Consider setting a reasonable limit unless dealing with a small number of rows.
warnings.objCreation: Object is created but no data has been migrated.
